item.title: It's all about YOU
item.description: If you need one reason, just one, why microformats are important, then you need to read Chris' latest post about the hResume Wordpress plugin over at FactoryCity. His comments are not just specific to hResume, they are relevant for all microformat marked-up PCEK.
